column1: # webanno.custom.Events | Events # webanno.custom.Participants | Participant # webanno.custom.Corefchains | Coref | AttachTo=webanno.custom.Participants
#text=Every night before putting my son to bed he gets his bath .
#text=we go up to the bathroom and I start the water and add his favorite bubbles .
#text=After he is undressed he stands next to the tub and giggles and dances watching the running water create a mass of bubbles !
#text=I make sure the water is warm enough , because his baths tend to last a bit longer than most .
#text=When the water is ready , he throws in all his tub toys , lizards and dinosaurs , cups and cars .
#text=The cars are his under water taxi 's for the fish , he says .
#text=He sits amiss the bubbles playing with his toys and laughing .
#text=We do the toe test , which is when i look at his toes and if they are wrinkle then time is up .
#text=Yup toes are wrinkled , he laughs as wash his body and hair .
#text=I let the water out as he sits there and waits for the tub to empty , only then does he want to get out .
#text=He helps to dry himself off and put his pajamas on .
